name: radiocorp/Radiocorp-API-PHP-SDK
description: Public/Private API for accessing RadioCorp recources through custom applications.\ At the moment only available for the stations 100% NL, SLAM! and SLAM!TV ### Available formats ### Available formats (based on the 'Accept' header):\ json, array, csv, html, jsonp, php, serialized, xml\ The API defaults to application/json when no header supplied. ### Contact / License ###
